snippet.title: Gambit Shifter - Official Trailer | IndieMania Showcase 2024
snippet.description:
Gambit Shifter is a relaxing, minimalist cozy puzzle game for chess experts and beginners alike! Check out the Gambit Shifter trailer to learn more about this game, featuring 80+ levels, requires no prior chess knowledge, and more. Gambit Shifter is available now on PC and Google Play. 

Take control of just a single piece and traverse through levels where every move counts. Shift your form and unlock new, varied movements as you clear your path to the enemy King!
